inputs.name: read_historical_data
inputs.description: Read historical Bitcoin data from the built-in CSV. Optionally provide a custom CSV path.

path.description: Optional CSV path inside the container; defaults to './data/BitcoinHistoricalData.csv'

inputs.name: read_historical_data_for_date_range
inputs.description: Read historical Bitcoin data from the built-in CSV for a specific date range. Optionally provide a custom CSV path.

path.description: Optional CSV path inside the container; defaults to './data/BitcoinHistoricalData.csv'

start_date.description: The start date for the date range filter.

end_date.description: The end date for the date range filter.
